synonyms.synonym: SubName: cDNA FLJ50771, highly similar to C-4 methylsterol oxidase (EC 1.14.13.72)

reference.reference_text: Li L, Kaplan J: Characterization of yeast methyl sterol oxidase (ERG25) and identification of a human homologue. J Biol Chem. 1996 Jul 12;271(28):16927-33.
